episodes.title: Epstein files released as FBI says it has identified over 1,000 victims
episodes.description:
The long-awaited release of the Epstein Files has been met with anger and disappointment by survivors.

Tonight hundreds of thousands of documents relating to the American sex offender Jeffrey Epstein were made public - but its not the full set.

Many are also heavily redacted - prompting fury from Donald Trump's opponents.

What we have learned is the true scale of Epstein's abuse.

The Department of Justice said it identified more than a thousand victims as part of its investigation.
And there were more photos of Epstein's lavish lifestyle and celebrity associates.

With the details, here's our US Correspondent Dan Rivers. 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

episodes.title: Epstein files: Victims and US politicians speak ahead of key vote | ITV News
episodes.description:
US Representatives hold a press conference with survivors of sex offender Jeffrey Epstein's abuse. 

Representatives Ro Khanna, Thomas Massie and Marjorie Taylor Greene are expected to speak and survivors of Epstein’s abuse will be presented at the start of the press conference.

episodes.title: Victim says Epstein tried to lure her to a dinner with a British royal | ITV News
episodes.description:
A survivor of the serial paedophile Jeffrey Epstein has given her first on the record interview telling ITV News how the disgraced financier tried to lure her to a dinner with a member of the British Royal family. 

Ann Fisher says she was assaulted by Epstein in May 2001 at his Upper East Side mansion in New York, having gone to what she thought was a business meeting. 

After talking for some three hours, he invited her to an upcoming dinner with a member of the Royal family where he said she would fit in well as Fisher is half English and according to Epstein, resembled Princess Diana. 

Epstein then attacked her. He later offered her a cheque which she refused. In the subsequent days, one of Epstein’s assistants repeatedly called her, on her mobile phone, her work phone and her home phone, pestering her to attend the dinner.

episodes.title: Andrew Mountbatten Windsor: The downfall of a former British prince | ITV News
episodes.description:
He was said to be the late Queen Elizabeth's favourite son, but after what is arguably the biggest royal scandal since the abdication crisis of 1936, the former prince will now be known as Andrew Mountbatten Windsor.

The disgraced royal, whose friendship with convicted paedophile financier Jeffrey Epstein led to his downfall, has also agreed to move out of his Windsor home.

He has strenuously denied the allegations made by Virginia Giuffre concerning him and Epstein, but a once-celebrated war hero, Mountbatten Windsor, is now an ex-prince, with his public life as a royal effectively ended by the King.

episodes.title: 'He was on the island': Giuffre memoir co-writer says Andrew could help investigation | ITV News
episodes.description:
The co-writer of Virginia Giuffre's memoir has said it would be a mistake to think "the fetishisation of young girls" died with Jeffrey Epstein, as she detailed how Prince Andrew could still help with the investigation.

Speaking to ITV News, Amy Wallace, who helped write the book, said she had "no doubt" about the truth of the allegations Giuffre made about the prince in it.

The book, titled Nobody's Girl, details Ms Giuffre's life and her interactions with Prince Andrew, Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.

episodes.title: Explained: Key Prince Andrew claims we learnt from Virginia Giuffre's posthumous memoir | ITV News
episodes.description:
What have we learnt from Virginia Giuffre's posthumous memoir about her alleged sexual abuse by Prince Andrew?

Virginia Giuffre detailed an orgy she claimed she had with Prince Andrew and Jeffrey Epstein in her posthumously published memoir that revealed more details about her alleged relationship with the former duke, who has long denied having ever met her.

In her memoir, Nobody's Girl, Ms Giuffre claimed she had sex three times with Andrew, in London, New York and on Epstein's private island.
